1. Use Daemon Tools Lite to mount the iso
2. When done, run the setup.exe
3. Wait for the game to install
4. If you did as me, the game should be in Computer/Programfiles/Ubisoft/Driver Parallel Lines
5. Now go back to the iso
6. Copy the only file in the "Farlight" map
7. Paste And replace it with the original file in the installed map
8. Play the game
